document.full_text: the revival, originally been aiming to open on broadway in the summer of 2008, will be staged at circle in the square, with previews to begin on oct. 13 and an opening night scheduled for nov. 7.
document.title: 'prepare ye the way of the lord': 'godspell' revival coming to broadway
lines_and_colors: the revival, originally been aiming to open on broadway in the summer of 2008, will be staged at circle in the square, with previews to begin on oct. 13 and an opening night scheduled for nov. 7.
